item.title: Zotcare
item.description: About ZotCare With ZotCare you can run your mobile health (mHealth) study: Zero to little programming knowledge Quick time to production No deployment or maintenance Utilize an AI-based approach for personalization and adaptation ZotCare Intuition Service Orchestration Services in ZotCare offer what researchers need to run any type of study. Main components in ZotCare service architecture are: Data Collection Services facilitate the ingestion of data from diverse devices, applications, and services. Once collected, the data undergoes processing and is stored as a continuous stream within ZotCare.
